title: What is Sterlite paint technology which is kept hidden until now? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you by any chance work for Sterlite and are trying to get some publicity for them. It seems to me that there is nothing hidden about them at all. They are just another company that provides high solids epoxy paints. If you mean the early claims about heat protection properties, there has never been any commercialization of this product which suggest it was probably a scam.
